pages.text: The arthana is one of the first tools within a witch's arsenal, it is as enchantable as a gold sword and effective as a gold sword, but as durable as an iron sword. This tool and weapon can be used to obtain rare drops from animals such as wool of bat.

pages.title: Arthana
pages.text: The arthana can also be placed on an altar to significantly increase the range at which it provides power to rituals or machines.
